msg: fixed jira 1662, allow pipeDocument to throw exceptions

msg: fixed jira 1824, changed current template rule when named template executes an xsl:apply-imports

msg: Replaced meaningless numbers by predefined constants in swapArray[] vector.

msg: Patch for Jira 1761. Output properties from multiple xsl:output instructions are now correctly merged (previously, only cdata-section-elements were handled correctly).

msg: Patch for Jira 2015. Namespace declarations are now reported on a first pass to avoid the problem described in the bug report.
